channel.title: Building Ant projects from Team Build
channel.description: Update: With Teamprise 3.0 we included this work into the freely downloadable Teamprise Extensions for Team Build. The source is also provided under the MS-PL if you are interested. You should definately look at the new version as it contains...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ed Blankenship+00:00
item.description: Wow this is really helpful! Please let us know when you make updates and include more features with the task in future releases of Teamprise.
item.dc:creator: Ed Blankenship

item.title: Comment by Krishnamurthy Dixit+00:00
item.description:
I have created a Java Application in Eclipse IDE(Version 3.3.1.1), used AntBuild (Version
1.7.0) and trying to do a Team Build using Team Foundation Server 2008. I have installed JDK
6.0 (jdk1.6.0_06).I am facing the error while running the Team Build.
Ant project "C:\Documents and Settings\username\Local
Settings\Temp\teamprojectname\BuildType\Sources\build.xml" is building with target(s)
"default"
Kindly suggest me the steps.
item.dc:creator: Krishnamurthy Dixit

item.title: Comment by Larry+00:00
item.description:
I am doing the build using the above you have mentioned. Build works fine. But now I want to checkin the ear file back to tfs using build process. I am not sure how to do it. THis is how i tried but it fails.
BuildFile="$(SolutionRoot)\build\build.xml" BuildUri="$(BuildUri)" Lib=""D:\Build\TFS_BUILDS\Distribution and Client Services\BulkEmail_OLD\Sources\source\lib" />
Error message Task "Exec" Command: "D:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE\tf.exe" Checkout D:\Build\TFS_BUILDS\Distribution and Client Services\BulkEmail_OLD\BuildType\..\Sources\build\beadapter.ear Unable to determine the workspace.
Can you please suggest a solution?
item.dc:creator: Larry
